original_text: ‘Son of man, Israel's people have become like dirt to me. They are like useless bits of metal that remain after silver is made pure in a hot oven.
korean_text: 인자야 이스라엘 족속이 내게 찌꺼기가 되었나니 곧 풀무 불 가운데에 있는 놋이나 주석이나 쇠나 납이며 은의 찌꺼기로다

sentences.original_text: Israel's people have become like dirt to me
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 내게는 흙과 같이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: They are like useless bits of metal
that remain after silver is made pure
